attributes.action: make harder penaltys for antisocial crimes and the death penalty for pedophiles!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
making the (pm) aware that so far the youth of today can get away with almost murder and nothing is done bar a silly sentance!!(2 10yr old boys case as an example )
and bring back the death penalty for pedophiles like the nursury case and baby p!!etc ect
we have forensics that can do the job!!

and get rid of this damn human rights for criminals (you choose to break the law then the law should be!against you!!

(pm )pull your finger out!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
